text: Politika (sr. Политика) is a daily newspaper that is very popular in Serbia. It is the longest-published newspaper in this country. It is over one hundred years old (established in 1904). This newspaper costs around 30 Dinars in Serbia. Its founder is Vladislav Ribnikar. == Other websites == * Official web address Category:Serbian culture Category:Newspapers in Europe Category:1904 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Serbia
title: Politika
